techmeme.title: Spotify updates its AI DJ to let Premium subscribers use English voice commands to customize its music selection, taking requests for artists, genres, and moods (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Dallas-based Bestow, which offers underwriting and insurance software to carriers, raised a $120M Series D led by Goldman Sachs and Smith Point Capital (Mary Ann Azevedo/TechCrunch)
Sources: ahead of I/O on May 20, Google is developing an AI "software development lifecycle agent" to help coders, and a Pinterest-like feature for consumers (Erin Woo/The Information)
Audible partners with US publishers to convert print books and e-books into AI-narrated audiobooks, with 100+ AI voices in English, Spanish, French, and Italian (Ashley Carman/Bloomberg)
Chinese drone company DJI unveils the €2,099 Mavic 4 Pro with a 360° rotating gimbal, and says it won't be available in the US at launch, a first for its drones (Sean Hollister/The Verge)
